revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: [(Col.) 172];;(3rd intercalary day, continued);;Harpagathes, son of Satabous [and Sambathion, grandson of - - -: - - -];Ptolemaios, son of Petheus [and - - -, grandson of - - -: - - -];Onnophris, son of Sisois [and Thaesis], grandson of Petsiris: [- - -];Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios [and - - -], grandson ofPnepheros: [- - -];Ammon, son of Apion - (through) Apion, son of Ammon - for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 5 drachmai; for olive (transportation), 4 obols 2 chalkoi; for naubion, [3 obols; for supplements, 1 drachme 1 1/2 obols]; for eparourion, 3 drachmai 2 obols; for supplements, 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, [1 obol 2 chalkoi. Total: 11 drachmai 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi].;And for Leonides, son of Apion, for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 1 drachme 2 chalkoi; for olive (transportation), 1 1/2 obols; for naubion, [1/2 obol 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi]; for eparourion, 4 1/2 obols; for supplements, 1/2 obol; for kollybos, 2 chalkoi. Total: 2 drachmai 3 1/2 obols].;(And) for the naubion of the catoeci, for year 14: 1 drachme 2 [1/2] obols; [for supplements: 1 obol; for kollybos: 2 chalkoi. Total: 1 drachme 3 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi].;(And) for the naubion of owners of private land, similarly: 4 obols; for supplements: 1 obol; [for kollybos, 2 chalkoi. Total: 5 obols 2 chalkoi]. (In left margin: 16 drachmai 15 obols.);Ptolemaios, son of Leonides [and - - -, grandson of - - -: - - -];Total for the day: 1[**] drachmai [. . obols].;;On the 4th similarly:;Sokmenis, son of Sokrates [and Tapetheus], grandson of Phasis, [for ch(--): 4 drachmai];Ammonis, son of Pasoknopaios [and Thatres], grandson of Limnaios, [for ch(--): - - -];Kopres, son of Orsenouphis, for the tax on camels, for year 14, [10] drachmai; [for supplements, 3 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi. Total: 10 drachmai 3 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi.] (In left margin: 8 drachmai 24 obols.);Horos also called Karanos, son of Petheus [and Tauris, grandson of Herakles], 12 drachmai 4 obols; (and) for the pig tax: [5 obols 2 chalkoi. Total: 13 drachmai 3 obols 2 chalkoi].;Chairemon, son of Heron [and Didyme], grandson of Orsenouphis, [for ch(--): - - -];Chairemon, son of Pasoxis [and Tanephremis], grandson of Pasoxis, [for ch(--): - - -];Ptolemaios, son of Petheus [and - - -, grandson of - - -: - - -] (In left margin: Aigypt(--): 8 . . .];Ptolemaios, son of Petheus [and - - -, grandson of - - -: - - -];Aphrodisis, son of Ptolemaios [and Tapetesouchos], grandson of Petheus, [for ch(--): - - -];Sisois, son of Petesouchos [and Tkonnos], grandson of Herakles, [for ch(--): - - -];Sarapion, slave of Syros [also called Ptolemaios, the off-spring of Thaisas, for ch(--): - - -];Horion, son of Aphrodisios [and Tapetaus], grandson of Onnophris, [for ch(--): 4 drachmai]

listBibl.bibl: Youtie HC - Pearl OM, PMich IV/2, 358C, col. [172], 1939, pl. I
